scripts.generate-favicon: mkdir -p assets/favicon && real-favicon generate sources/favicon/faviconDescription.json sources/favicon/faviconData.json assets/favicon
scripts.postgenerate-favicon:
for file in assets/favicon/browserconfig.xml assets/favicon/site.webmanifest; do perl -pi -e 'print "---
---

" if $. == 1' "$file"; perl -pi -e 's//assets/.+(?=\?v=\d+)/{% link $& %}/g' "$file"; done
